sections.comments: As the course is on-line this term you DO NOT HAVE TO REGISTER FOR LABS!For registration and wait list information, see: https://www.stat.ubc.ca/undergrad-registration-info-and-faqsSeats reserved for Stat specializations will be released one month after registration open if not filled. Students registered on the wait list will receive first priority for unfilled seats.

For registration information, see:https://www.stat.ubc.ca/undergrad-registration-info-and-faqsSEATS RESERVED FOR STATISTICS MAJORS WILL BE RELEASED ON AUGUST 1ST IF NOT FILLED.Note: We are no longer holding labs for this course this term

description: Review of probability theory. Sampling distribution theory, large sample theory and methods of estimation and hypothesis testing, including maximum likelihood estimation, likelihood ratio testing and confidence interval construction.
